data.title: Filming Applications – The View From The Shard
data.text:
Filming Applications

01.03.2024

The View from The Shard welcomes requests to film within the attraction. Located on Level 69 and 72 of Western Europe’s tallest building, The View from The Shard offers sweeping 360 degree views over the UK’s capital for 40 miles, providing a unique location for your shoot.

We are proud to offer exclusive use of the full attraction, and if required, a comprehensive team of trained guest ambassadors to aid the smooth running of your shoot and a highly professional and discreet security team.

‘The View from The Shard’s precision, organisation and communication prior to and during filming were first class. The team made our time at The View from The Shard run like clockwork. Both the crew and the talent were impressed and thoroughly appreciated and notices all your hard work.’

CAROLINE FOOTE, ITV
